addExtension

public static java.io.File addExtension(java.io.File file,
                                        java.lang.String extension)
Checks if the specified File name ends with the specified extension. If not adds the extension to the file name.

Parameters:
file - a file
extension - a file extension
Returns:
a File with the specified extension

cancelBecauseFileExist

public static final boolean cancelBecauseFileExist(java.awt.Component parentComponent,
                                                   java.io.File f)
Asks if the user wants to replace a file if this file already exists.

Parameters:
parentComponent - determines the Frame in which the dialog is displayed; if null, or if the parentComponent has no Frame, a default Frame is used
f - A file.
Returns:
True if the user wants to cancel. False otherwise.
